scripts.generateDocs: pnpm build && pnpm jsdoc -r -d docs/ -c doc_conf.json build/

scriptsComments.dev: Starts the development server using vite-plugin-node for rapid iteration.
scriptsComments.startProd: Runs the built app in production mode. Note this requires globally-installed npm package http-server (pnpm i -g http-server).
scriptsComments.test:watch: Runs the test suite on changes.
scriptsComments.typeorm: helper alias for our specific typeorm plugin
scriptsComments.typeorm:drop: Resets typeorm's internal idea of your database's state
scriptsComments.typeorm:sync: Syncs database to current Models state, like synchronize: true in our datasources
scriptsComments.migration:create: Creates new migration for manual entry, used like > pnpm migration:create ./src/db/migrations/MyNewMigrationName
scriptsComments.migrations:generate: Auto-generates a new migration based on any entity changes you made to your JS files, used like > pnpm migration:generate ./src/db/migrations/IpHistoryAddMethod
scriptsComments.migration:revert: Undoes the most recent migration, can be called multiple times in a row
scriptsComments.seed: Starts Doggr in seed mode (Create default database entries), used like > pnpm seed
